Next, we present our predictions for distributions of diphoton pairs produced at the energy of the LHC. Various distributions of the diphoton pairs produced from the decay of a Higgs boson are contrasted with those produced from QCD continuum processes at the LHC, showing that enhanced sensitivity to the signal can be obtained with judicious event selection.
